headline: Colgate Women’s Games Officially Kicks off 49th Season with Return to Indoor Competition
summary: NEW YORK, November 12, 2024--Colgate-Palmolive (NYSE:CL) announces today that registration for Colgate Women’s Games, the nation's longest-running indoor Track & Field series for girls and women, is now open. Now through January 5, 2025, athletes can register online to compete and parents, coaches, and fans can sign up at www.ColgateWomensGames.com to receive important updates about the series, which will take place from December 29 through February 1.
